titleStmt.title: A letter sent by Col. Cobbet from the General Council of Officers to Gen. Monk with his ansvver to the said letter, dated at Edinburgh Octob. 27, 1659 : together with a letter intended to have been sent from the militia of London, to General Monk, and the officers under his command in Scotland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
Committee for the Militia of London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
